public class HintTextBox
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.TextBox
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.BlurHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.FocusHandler

A text box that handles hints



This is a simple text box, that manages an hint message.

Author:
Alessandro Casolla
